title: Srikanto
overview: Srikanto and Rajlokkhi's sensual yet sporadic love transcends space and time. At a time of heartbreaking separation between the two, Abhaya enters Srikanto's life even as his passionate fascination with Rajlokkhi strives for closure. Srikanto is the musical retelling of Sarat Chandra Chattopadhyay's eponymous novel and presents a modern take on the relationship of Srikanto-Rajlokkhi.
